verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-Ber spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. saying

צַ֚ו <S%H6680><s%> tzav Command אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel וִֽישַׁלְּחוּ֙ <S%H7971><s%> vi-shal-le-Chu that they put out מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- from הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֔ה <S%H4264><s%> ham-ma-cha-Neh, of the camp כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- every צָר֖וּעַ <S%H6879><s%> tza-Ru-a' every leper וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol and everyone זָ֑ב <S%H2100><s%> Zav; and every one that hath an issue וְכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> ve-Chol and everyone טָמֵ֥א <S%H2931><s%> ta-Me and whosoever is defiled לָנָֽפֶשׁ׃ <S%H5315><s%> la-Na-fesh. by the dead

מִזָּכָ֤ר <S%H2145><s%> miz-za-Char Both male עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- against נְקֵבָה֙ <S%H5347><s%> ne-ke-Vah and female תְּשַׁלֵּ֔חוּ <S%H7971><s%> te-shal-Le-chu, shall ye put out אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about מִח֥וּץ <S%H2351><s%> mi-Chutz without לַֽמַּחֲנֶ֖ה <S%H4264><s%> lam-ma-cha-Neh the camp תְּשַׁלְּח֑וּם <S%H7971><s%> te-shal-le-Chum; shall ye put וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo they will not יְטַמְּאוּ֙ <S%H2930><s%> ye-tam-me-'U them that they defile אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מַ֣חֲנֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H4264><s%> ma-cha-nei-Hem, not their camps אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher whereof אֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I שֹׁכֵ֥ן <S%H7931><s%> sho-Chen I dwell בְּתוֹכָֽם׃ <S%H8432><s%> be-to-Cham. in the midst

וַיַּֽעֲשׂוּ־ <S%H6213><s%> vai-ya-'a-su- did so כֵן֙ <S%H3651><s%> chen so בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel וַיְשַׁלְּח֣וּ <S%H7971><s%> vay-shal-le-Chu and put them out אוֹתָ֔ם <S%H853><s%> o-Tam, אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about מִח֖וּץ <S%H2351><s%> mi-Chutz without לַֽמַּחֲנֶ֑ה <S%H4264><s%> lam-ma-cha-Neh; the camp כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher after דִּבֶּ֤ר <S%H1696><s%> dib-Ber spake יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh as the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh, unto Moses כֵּ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> ken thus עָשׂ֖וּ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Su so did בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel פ Peh
וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-Ber spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. saying

דַּבֵּר֮ <S%H1696><s%> dab-Ber Speak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֒ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish When a man אֽוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> 'ov- or אִשָּׁ֗ה <S%H802><s%> 'ish-Shah, or woman כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki When יַעֲשׂוּ֙ <S%H6213><s%> ya-'a-Su shall commit מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> mik-kol all manner חַטֹּ֣את <S%H2403><s%> chat-Tot any sin הָֽאָדָ֔ם <S%H120><s%> ha-'a-Dam, that men לִמְעֹ֥ל <S%H4603><s%> lim-'Ol commit מַ֖עַל <S%H4604><s%> Ma-'al to do a trespass בַּיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; against the LORD וְאָֽשְׁמָ֖ה <S%H816><s%> ve-'a-she-Mah be guilty הַנֶּ֥פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> han-Ne-fesh and that person הַהִֽוא׃ <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hiv. he

וְהִתְוַדּ֗וּ <S%H3034><s%> ve-hit-vad-Du, Then they shall confess אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- חַטָּאתָם֮ <S%H2403><s%> chat-ta-Tam their sin אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which עָשׂוּ֒ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Su which they have done וְהֵשִׁ֤יב <S%H7725><s%> ve-he-Shiv and he shall recompense אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֲשָׁמוֹ֙ <S%H817><s%> a-sha-Mo his trespass בְּרֹאשׁ֔וֹ <S%H7218><s%> be-ro-Sho, with the principal וַחֲמִישִׁת֖וֹ <S%H2549><s%> va-cha-mi-shi-To unto it the fifth יֹסֵ֣ף <S%H3254><s%> yo-Sef thereof and add עָלָ֑יו <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav; of וְנָתַ֕ן <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-Tan [part] thereof and give לַאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> la-'a-Sher whom אָשַׁ֥ם <S%H816><s%> 'a-Sham [it] unto [him] against whom he hath trespassed לֽוֹ׃ lo.

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> ve-'im- if אֵ֨ין <S%H369><s%> 'ein has לָאִ֜ישׁ <S%H376><s%> la-'Ish But if the man גֹּאֵ֗ל <S%H1350><s%> go-'El, have no kinsman לְהָשִׁ֤יב <S%H7725><s%> le-ha-Shiv to recompense הָאָשָׁם֙ <S%H817><s%> ha-'a-Sham the trespass אֵלָ֔יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav, for הָאָשָׁ֛ם <S%H817><s%> ha-'a-Sham unto let the trespass הַמּוּשָׁ֥ב <S%H7725><s%> ham-mu-Shav be recompensed לַיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh unto the LORD לַכֹּהֵ֑ן <S%H3548><s%> lak-ko-Hen; [even] to the priest מִלְּבַ֗ד <S%H905><s%> mil-le-Vad, alone אֵ֚יל <S%H352><s%> 'eil beside the ram הַכִּפֻּרִ֔ים <S%H3725><s%> hak-kip-pu-Rim, of the atonement אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which יְכַפֶּר־ <S%H3722><s%> ye-chap-per- whereby an atonement shall be made בּ֖וֹ bo עָלָֽיו׃ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav. Also

וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol every תְּרוּמָ֞ה <S%H8641><s%> te-ru-Mah And every offering לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> le-chol to all קָדְשֵׁ֧י <S%H6944><s%> ka-de-Shei of all the holy things בְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which יַקְרִ֥יבוּ <S%H7126><s%> yak-Ri-vu which they bring לַכֹּהֵ֖ן <S%H3548><s%> lak-ko-Hen unto the priest ל֥וֹ lo יִהְיֶֽה׃ <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh. become

וְאִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ve-'Ish And every man's אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- קֳדָשָׁ֖יו <S%H6944><s%> ko-da-Shav hallowed things ל֣וֹ lo יִהְי֑וּ <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yu; becomes אִ֛ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish shall be his whatsoever any man אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- shall be his whatever יִתֵּ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> yit-Ten giveth לַכֹּהֵ֖ן <S%H3548><s%> lak-ko-Hen the priest ל֥וֹ lo יִהְיֶֽה׃ <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh. becomes פ Peh
וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-Ber spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. saying

דַּבֵּר֙ <S%H1696><s%> dab-Ber Speak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel וְאָמַרְתָּ֖ <S%H559><s%> ve-'a-mar-Ta and say אֲלֵהֶ֑ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-le-Hem; about אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish unto them If any אִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> 'ish man's כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- If תִשְׂטֶ֣ה <S%H7847><s%> tis-Teh go aside אִשְׁתּ֔וֹ <S%H802><s%> ish-To, wife וּמָעֲלָ֥ה <S%H4603><s%> u-ma-'a-Lah and commit ב֖וֹ vo מָֽעַל׃ <S%H4604><s%> Ma-'al. a trespass

וְשָׁכַ֨ב <S%H7901><s%> ve-sha-Chav lie אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish And a man אֹתָהּ֮ <S%H854><s%> 'o-Tah for שִׁכְבַת־ <S%H7902><s%> shich-vat- seed זֶרַע֒ <S%H2233><s%> ze-Ra' child וְנֶעְלַם֙ <S%H5956><s%> ve-ne'-Lam and it be hid מֵעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> me-'ei-Nei from the eyes אִישָׁ֔הּ <S%H376><s%> 'i-Shah, of her husband וְנִסְתְּרָ֖ה <S%H5641><s%> ve-nis-te-Rah and be kept close וְהִ֣יא <S%H1931><s%> ve-Hi herself נִטְמָ֑אָה <S%H2930><s%> nit-Ma-'ah; and she be defiled וְעֵד֙ <S%H5707><s%> ve-'Ed and [there be] no witness אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> 'ein and there בָּ֔הּ Bah, וְהִ֖וא <S%H1931><s%> ve-Hiv herself לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo has not נִתְפָּֽשָׂה׃ <S%H8610><s%> nit-Pa-sah. against her neither she be taken

וְעָבַ֨ר <S%H5674><s%> ve-'a-Var come עָלָ֧יו <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav over רֽוּחַ־ <S%H7307><s%> Ru-ach- And the spirit קִנְאָ֛ה <S%H7068><s%> kin-'Ah of jealousy וְקִנֵּ֥א <S%H7065><s%> ve-kin-Ne upon him and he be jealous אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אִשְׁתּ֖וֹ <S%H802><s%> ish-To of his wife וְהִ֣וא <S%H1931><s%> ve-Hiv she נִטְמָ֑אָה <S%H2930><s%> nit-Ma-'ah; and she be defiled אוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> 'ov- or עָבַ֨ר <S%H5674><s%> 'a-Var come עָלָ֤יו <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav over רֽוּחַ־ <S%H7307><s%> Ru-ach- or if the spirit קִנְאָה֙ <S%H7068><s%> kin-'Ah of jealousy וְקִנֵּ֣א <S%H7065><s%> ve-kin-Ne upon him and he be jealous אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אִשְׁתּ֔וֹ <S%H802><s%> ish-To, of his wife וְהִ֖יא <S%H1931><s%> ve-Hi he לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo has not נִטְמָֽאָה׃ <S%H2930><s%> nit-Ma-'ah. and she be not defiled

וְהֵבִ֨יא <S%H935><s%> ve-he-Vi bring הָאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ha-'Ish Then shall the man אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אִשְׁתּוֹ֮ <S%H802><s%> ish-To his wife אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הַכֹּהֵן֒ <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-Hen unto the priest וְהֵבִ֤יא <S%H935><s%> ve-he-Vi and he shall bring אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- קָרְבָּנָהּ֙ <S%H7133><s%> ka-re-ba-Nah her offering עָלֶ֔יהָ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-ha, for עֲשִׂירִ֥ת <S%H6224><s%> 'a-si-Rit for her the tenth הָאֵיפָ֖ה <S%H374><s%> ha-'ei-Fah [part] of an ephah קֶ֣מַח <S%H7058><s%> Ke-mach meal שְׂעֹרִ֑ים <S%H8184><s%> se-'o-Rim; of barley לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- nor יִצֹ֨ק <S%H3332><s%> yi-Tzok he shall pour עָלָ֜יו <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav and שֶׁ֗מֶן <S%H8081><s%> She-men, no oil וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- nor יִתֵּ֤ן <S%H5414><s%> yit-Ten upon it nor put עָלָיו֙ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav and לְבֹנָ֔ה <S%H3828><s%> le-vo-Nah, frankincense כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- grain מִנְחַ֤ת <S%H4503><s%> min-Chat thereon for it [is] an offering קְנָאֹת֙ <S%H7068><s%> ke-na-'Ot of jealousy ה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> Hu, he מִנְחַ֥ת <S%H4503><s%> min-Chat an offering זִכָּר֖וֹן <S%H2146><s%> zik-ka-Ron of memorial מַזְכֶּ֥רֶת <S%H2142><s%> maz-Ke-ret to remembrance עָוֹֽן׃ <S%H5771><s%> 'a-Von. iniquity

וְהִקְרִ֥יב <S%H7126><s%> ve-hik-Riv shall bring her near אֹתָ֖הּ <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tah הַכֹּהֵ֑ן <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-Hen; And the priest וְהֶֽעֱמִדָ֖הּ <S%H5975><s%> ve-he-'e-mi-Dah and set לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei her before יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh. God

וְלָקַ֧ח <S%H3947><s%> ve-la-Kach shall take הַכֹּהֵ֛ן <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-Hen And the priest מַ֥יִם <S%H4325><s%> Ma-yim water קְדֹשִׁ֖ים <S%H6918><s%> ke-do-Shim holy בִּכְלִי־ <S%H3627><s%> bich-li- vessel חָ֑רֶשׂ <S%H2789><s%> Cha-res; in an earthen וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> u-min- some הֶֽעָפָ֗ר <S%H6083><s%> he-'a-Far, and of the dust אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher after יִהְיֶה֙ <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh is on בְּקַרְקַ֣ע <S%H7172><s%> be-kar-Ka' that is in the floor הַמִּשְׁכָּ֔ן <S%H4908><s%> ham-mish-Kan, of the tabernacle יִקַּ֥ח <S%H3947><s%> yik-Kach shall take הַכֹּהֵ֖ן <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-Hen the priest וְנָתַ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-Tan and put אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הַמָּֽיִם׃ <S%H4325><s%> ham-Ma-yim. [it] into the water
